title: Coaches on the hot seat
itunes:title: Coaches on the hot seat
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe – discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including the Dolphins firing offensive coordinator Bill Lazor, and an injury update for Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski. Then, the heroes discuss a few head coaches who may be on the hot seat as the season draws to a close. Plus, east coast correspondent Conor Orr returns for another edition of “Orr you kidding me?”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
